definition[0]: official connections between countries, companies, organizations etc
example[0]: Britain threatened to break off diplomatic relations with the regime.
example[1]: Relations between the two countries have improved recently.
definition[1]: the way in which people or groups of people behave towards each other
example[2]: Relations between workers and management are generally good.
